SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Network.ToModel

Interface ClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, SocketClient
public interface ClientInterface extends Remote
This interface defines the methods that a client can invoke remotely on a server. It extends the Remote interface to indicate that these methods can be invoked remotely.

    Method

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(ViewMessage msg) throws RemoteException
      Updates the client's view with the provided message.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message containing information to update the view.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related exception during the remote method invocation.

    • quit

      void quit(ViewMessage msg) throws IOException
      Signals the server that the client wishes to quit.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message indicating the reason for quitting.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O related exception.

    • addToViewQueue

      void addToViewQueue(ModelMessage msg) throws RemoteException
      Adds a model message to the client's view queue.
      Parameters:
      msg - The model message to be added to the client's view queue.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related exception during the remote method invocation.

    • run

      void run() throws RemoteException, InterruptedException
      Initiates the client's execution logic.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related exception during the remote method invocation.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the method is interrupted.

    • registerToServer

      void registerToServer(double ID, ClientInterface client) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Registers the client to the server with a unique ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique identifier for the client.
      client - The client interface instance to register with the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related exception during the remote method invocation.
      NotBoundException - If the server is not bound to this client.

    • setView

      void setView(View view) throws RemoteException
      Sets the view associated with the client.
      Parameters:
      view - The view object to associate with the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related exception during the remote method invocation.

    • pong

      void pong() throws RemoteException
      Pings the server to confirm connectivity.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is a communication-related exception during the remote method invocation.
